entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
